channel.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
channel.description: What do you think? If someone has a reason which could be deemed good [like terminal illness], do you think they should be allowed? or if they medically have a condition such as depression and something bad happens, do you think they should?

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

redragonje65:

I’ve always wanted to be old/a hobo so that i could walk around and piss on random people and have a good excuse for it.

haha, i can do that and my execuse would be “oops” or “well it’s funny…”

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @LegendScape LegendScape
item.description:
@LegendScape wrote:

I sometimes wonder about heaven i mean when i think about it. Living enternity without risk, fear, CHANGE, no sin hmm i couldnt take living without a gun fight or a nice sword battle something exciting.

anyway suicide is a mental illness forgot all the studies done on it but has something to do with the brain producing too much of something.

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @rjop455 rjop455
item.description:
@rjop455 wrote:

Why would anyone want to throw away there life? NOTHING that could ever happen to me would make me kill myself. Life is a great gift no matter how bad it gets. To throw it away would be a waste. I do believe in life after death and in truth I look fowards to it, but not to the point of killing myself. Death is too long and life is too short, plain and simple. It’s not up to us when we die anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

[quote=“pko, post:46, topic:113200”][quote author=nade link=topic=161871.msg1516871#msg1516871 date=1182255422]
Fuck, don’t commit suicide. If life doesn’t work out - become a criminal. Jail is awesome. All that stuff about being raped is not true. That’s just a big cover up to keep people from knowing how awesome jail is. Not only you get free shelter, but free food, friends, work, school, you name it. Fuck it - it’s better then my life right now. I don’t have to deal with clients who have no basic understanding of computers to ask me to code impossible solutions.
[/quote]

no rape? aw man :([/quote]
Actually, jail is better…free food, no taxes, 21/24 hours in a cell, why not?!

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?

item.description:
@tL wrote:

[quote=“xxbestxx, post:35, topic:113200”][quote author=Casey. link=topic=161871.msg1516483#msg1516483 date=1182248830]
Well, I can remember I saw on CNN not to long ago a story about this doctor who aided in the deaths of leik 300 people?!
And he went to jail for it.

Euthanasia is a crime I believe.
And since our government is to lazy to pass a bill to reverse this, I guess it will remain a penalty.

[/quote]
his name is dr.death[/quote]

Harrold shipman, he lived like a 45min drive away from me, but he killed himself in jail.

He was a doctor and got thrills over drugging old people to death, what a fun thing to waste your time on ^_^.

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @RLN RLN
item.description:
@RLN wrote:

No it's not an option. It's built into our DNA. Little tiny DNA fragments contain the exact date of when we will commit suicide. Normally for most humans the date exceeds our life span, so most people do not commit suicide.
LOL

Read full topic

item.title: Suicide: Is it an option?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

nade:

Why torture yourself? Just take your anger and depression out on someone else?

I’m no emo, but i know that its possible to relieve stress or vent anger with “cutting” As people say or self mutilation, and in my opinion you can call them emo’s all you want for doing that, even i used to do that.

But for god sakes don’t make other peoples lives shit by taking your own anger out on other people - that is exactly what a chav would do.

Read full topic
